path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/Arya Token Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The owner can mint under the limit, potentially leading to an unlimited number of tokens being created.

findings.title: Unprotected mint function with onlyOwner modifier
findings.description: The mint function has an onlyOwner modifier, allowing the owner to mint under a certain limit without proper access control.
